A deep, foreboding hum emanates from the tainted earth, and then Calina is suddenly slammed into the ground by an irresistable force. Dust clouds rise as the earth shifts and sharp rocks slide and bounce, some flying into the air. Enero yelps in pain as several of them smash into him.
